duties_responsibilities.duty: Promoting a culture of accountability to meet or exceed the store’s goals related to retail and service sales, guest loyalty, payroll, retail shrink, and omni-channel initiatives.
Leading a team of stylists, estheticians, and boutique leads to achieve sales growth in retail and services, and driving the business through a focus on performance, people, and process.
Planning and executing in-store events that deliver an unrivaled guest experience, driving brand partner collaboration and delivering on sales and payroll goals.

Attracting and building a highly engaged team that embodies the Ulta Beauty brand through effective collaboration, open and honest two-way communication, prioritization of work and coaching to drive guest loyalty.

Establishing performance metrics for the team and/or personal goals, including attendance at all required training/education programs, coaching, individual development plans, and annual performance appraisals.
Managing service and boutique supply inventory and ordering process, ensuring allocated budget is adhered to and necessary products for services are on hand.

Communicating and providing feedback to field leadership, including the Business Market Trainer and Field Business Leader, on business trends and opportunities, events, operational challenges, merchandise needs, and the competitive landscape.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree is preferred, but not required.
